PROGRAM 1 : Develop a test to Open a Firefox browser using Selenium WebDriver
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver;
public class prg1 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.gecko.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/geckodriver");
WebDriver driver=new FirefoxDriver();
driver.get("https://www.google.com");
}
}

PROGRAM 2 : Test the case To Print a Message to display that the website is opened successfully wait for 5 Seconds and Close the Browser
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg2 {
public static void main(String[] args)throws InterruptedException {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/ chromedriver");
String expectedtitle="Google";
String actualtitle="";
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.navigate().to("http://www.google.com");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
JavascriptExecutor js=(JavascriptExecutor)driver;
js.executeScript("scrollBy(0,5000)");
actualtitle=driver.getTitle();
if (actualtitle.contentEquals(expectedtitle));
{
System.out.println("Website opened successfully");
}
Thread.sleep(5000);
driver.quit();
}
}

PROGRAM 3 : Develop Tests to Upload a File with Send Keys Method by Using Web Driver
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg3 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
String baseUrl=("http://demo.guru99.com/test/upload");
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.get(baseUrl);
WebElement uploadElement=driver.findElement(By.id("uploadfile_0"));
uploadElement.sendKeys("/home/user/Documents/sample.html");
driver.findElement(By.id("terms")).click();
driver.findElement(By.name("send")).click();
}
}

PROGRAM 4 : Automate to Access a Link in Selenium Web driverby link Text () and partial Link Text ()
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg4 {
public static void main(String[] args)throws InterruptedException {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
String baseUrl="https://www.google.com/";
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.get(baseUrl);
WebElement n=driver.findElement(By.linkText("Gmail"));
n.click();
System.out.println("Current page title:"+driver.getTitle());
WebElement m=driver.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Sign"));
Thread.sleep(5000);
driver.quit();
}
}

PROGRAM 5 : To Locate a link by Selecting multiple items in a dropdown
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select;
public class prg5 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver" );
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.get("https://demo.guru99.com/test/newtours/register.php");
Select country=new Select(driver.findElement(By.name("country")));
country.selectByVisibleText("INDIA");
}
}

PROGRAM 6 : Develop a test to Locate a frame using Tag Name
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg6 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver" );
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.get("https://demo.guru99.com/test/guru99home/");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
driver.switchTo().frame("a077aa5e");
System.out.println("********We are switch to the iframe*******");
driver.findElement(By.xpath("html/body/a/img")).click();
System.out.println("******We are done********");
}
}

PROGRAM 7 : Test the case to Submit a login form using Web driver
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.Keys;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg7 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.manage().window().maximize();
driver.get("https://github.com/login");
driver.findElement(By.name("login")).sendKeys("aiml2023st@gmail.com");
driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("Aiml$2023");
driver.findElement(By.name("commit")).click();
}
}

PROGRAM 8 : Develop a test to Synchronize with an implicit wait
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import java.time.Duration;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg8 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.manage().timeouts().implicitlyWait(Duration.ofSeconds(5000000));
String eTitle="Google";
String aTitle="";
driver.get("https://www.google.com");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
aTitle=driver.getTitle();
if(aTitle.equals(eTitle))
{
System.out.println("Test Passed");
}
else
{
System.out.println("Test failed");
}
driver.close();
}
}

PROGRAM 9 : Develop a test to Synchronize with an explicit wait
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import java.time.Duration;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.WebDriverWait;
public class prg9 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
WebDriverWait wait=new WebDriverWait(driver,Duration.ofSeconds(50));
String eTitle="Google";
String aTitle="";
driver.get("https://www.google.com");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
wait.until(ExpectedConditions.titleIs(eTitle));
if(aTitle.equals(eTitle))
{
System.out.println("Test Passed");
}
else
{
System.out.println("Test failed");
}
driver.close();
}
}

PROGRAM 10 : Test the case by Identifying and handling a pop-up window by its name
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Set;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg 10{
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
driver.get("https://demo.guru99.com/popup.php");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[contains(@href,'popup.php')]")).click();
String MainWindow = driver.getWindowHandle();
Set<String> s1 = driver.getWindowHandles();
Iterator<String> i1 = s1.iterator();
while (i1.hasNext()) {
String ChildWindow = i1.next();
if (!MainWindow.equalsIgnoreCase(ChildWindow)) {
driver.switchTo().window(ChildWindow);
driver.findElement(By.name("emailid")).sendKeys("abc@gmail.com");
driver.findElement(By.name("btnLogin")).click();
driver.close();
}
}
driver.switchTo().window(MainWindow);
}
}

PROGRAM 11 : Develop a test plan to use locators with parameters to search for keyword
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
public class prg11 {
public static void main(String[] args) {
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
String baseUrl = "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page";
WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
driver.get(baseUrl);
driver.manage().window().maximize();
WebElement e = driver.findElement(By.className("mw-headline"));
System.out.println(e.getText());
WebElement a = driver.findElement(By.linkText("Create account"));
a.click();
WebElement n = driver.findElement(By.id("wpName2"));
n.sendKeys("Student1234");
WebElement m = driver.findElement(By.id("wpPassword2"));
m.sendKeys("JavaScript");
WebElement l = driver.findElement(By.id("wpRetype"));
l.sendKeys("JavaScript");
WebElement j = driver.findElement(By.name("email"));
j.sendKeys("JavaScript@gmail.com");
}
}

PROGRAM 12 : Automate the test case by dynamic XPath in Selenium Using Double Slash
SOURCE CODE:
package aiml;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions;
public class prg12 {
public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","/home/user/Downloads/selenium/chromedriver");
WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
driver.get("https://portal2.passportindia.gov.in/AppOnlineProject/user/RegistrationBaseAction");
driver.manage().window().maximize();
Actions actions = new Actions(driver);
actions.moveToElement(driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[@id='passoffice']"))).perform();
Thread.sleep(1000);
actions.moveToElement(driver.findElement(By.id("passportoffices2"))).click().perform();
Thread.sleep(1000);
}
}
